[float]
[[install-agent]]
//tag::install-agent-widget[]

The **Add agent** flyout has two options: **Enroll in {fleet}** and
**Run standalone**. 
Enrolling agents in {fleet} (default) provides a centralized management tool in {kib},
reducing management overhead.
